channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Physical Rescue; INC#1342; 07:30PM; 4738 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wuTFFZ; #MidCity; Firefighters extricated one person from a two-vehicle collision, using hydraulic rescue tools. There were a total of 6 patients, and 5 were treated and transported to area hospitals by LAFD. The following are the age/gender/condition of the transported patients: 51F and 62F - critical, 51M - serious, 40F and 13F - moderate. One 46M declined transport, with only minor injuries. Additional circumstances unknown. Nothing further.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E26 E261 E61 E68 EM11 EM5 EM9 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA34 RA61 RA62 RA829 RA858 RA861 T26 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Sinking Vessel; INC#1240; 06:40PM; Los Angeles Harbor; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUVrYj; #SanPedro; LAFD Fire Boats are working on flipping the vessel upright and towing it to the launch ramp. All six people who were rescued off the sinking vessel, and brought to shore by LA County Lifeguards, are in good condition and none required hospital transport. LAFD will assist them back to their vehicles. Nothing further.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District outside city; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E112 E248 E36 RA101 RA112 T48; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1342; 06:30PM; 4738 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wuTFFZ; #MidCity; PRELIM: Two-vehicle traffic collision involving a pedestrian. One person trapped. Firefighters are initiating medical care and extrication operations.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E26 E261 E61 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 T26 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1265; 06:25PM; 20900 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QsjSf5; #Winnetka; Firefighters responded to a 3-vehicle collision with no entrapment. Seven people were assessed by firefighters and paramedics on scene. One 17-year-old female refused transport. The other six patients were transported to area hospitals in good-to-fair condition, all with minor injuries. The ages and genders of those transported are: 18-month-old male, 34F, 25M, 12M, 14F, and 17F. Nothing further.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E72 EM15 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA828 RA896; CH8; 13 18; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1265; 05:45PM; 20900 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QsjSf5; #Winnetka; LAFD is on scene of a three-vehicle collision with at least seven patients requiring medical assistance. LAPD Inc #3270.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E72 EM15 RA72 RA828 RA896; CH8; Nicholas Prange

Sinking Vessel; INC#1240; 05:20PM; Los Angeles Harbor; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUVrYj; #SanPedro; LAFD fire boat crews responded to a capsized vessel, where they will attempt to assist with uprighting the vessel. LA County Lifeguard Boat has picked up 6 people from the sinking vessel and will be taking them to Fire Station 110 for medical assessment by LAFD Paramedics. All are in minor-to-moderate condition.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District outside city; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E112 E248 E36 RA101 RA112 T48; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1074; 04:51PM; 6100 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JmOXNT; #SepulvedaBasin; Firefighters responded to the archery range, where a two-acre brush fire burned nearby, stoked by sustained winds. Employees and patrons of the archery range were evacuated temporarily while firefighters went to work to contain the flames. Ultimately, it took 41 firefighters an hour and 19 minutes to contain the vegetation fire to approximately two acres, which consumed grass, brush, and trees. Evacuation has been lifted. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E100 E288 E290 E39 E81 E83 E88 E90 EM14 EM17 H0B H0C H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA88 T88 T90 UR88 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire; INC#1074; 03:32PM; 6100 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JmOXNT; #SepulvedaBasin; Approximately two acres of grass burning with 10 mph winds (gusts 20-30 mph) moving to the southeast (near the archery range).; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CM40 CM42 E288 E39 E83 E88 T88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1026; 02:53PM; NB 170 Fwy x Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4ad8JWx; #NorthHollywood; Crews are battling flames in approximately one-quarter acre of brush burning on the embankment just south of Burbank Blvd (near the offramp). It took 24 firefighters 25 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E60 E76 E86 T60; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Update Hazardous Materials; INC#0673; 03:15PM; 8700 N Lindley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4b46s1o; #Northridge; LAFD Hazardous Materials specialists scanned the area and found all readings normal (wind dissipated the small amounts of powder initially observed). No off-site hazard. No evacuations. No additional injuries. Crews remained on scene to assist the LA Medical Examiner with both body recoveries. Nothing further.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 CM40 CM42 E28 E287 E288 E88 E95 JT1 JT4 RA70 RA87 RA90 SQ87 SQ95 T87 T88 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange
